attributes.action: We the people of Scotland request a full investigation & Audit into Holyrood
attributes.additional_details: The people of scotland are tired of not being listened to. Only SNP supporters voices count to them and the country is fractured and devided more than ever before. There are people with minimal or not qualified to do roles in vastly overpaid positions within the administration. Most aspects of Scottish life and communities are worse now than any time over the last 14yrs. We also request a full investigation into the handling of Covid19 in care homes and education. Our education is failing.
attributes.background: Have a full investigation and audit into the Scottish Administration. A full financial examination as to where money is being distributed and the companies and shareholders invested in those corporations. We would like to know where all the information is collected for all of their stats reported.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament and Audit Scotland, not the UK Government or House of Commons, are responsible for scrutinising the policy and expenditure of the Scottish Government.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
